title: Super Bowl LIV Preview With Chris Long | The Ryen Russillo Podcast
description:
Russillo is joined by two-time Super Bowl champion Chris Long to preview Super Bowl LIV between the Kansas City Chiefs and the San Francisco 49ers in Miami, Florida, this upcoming Sunday.
Check out Chris’s work at Chalk Media as well as his own preview on his podcast Green Light with Chris Long.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
